org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop

Interface Hadoop


  • public interface Hadoop
    Hadoop facade providing access to Ignite Hadoop features.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HadoopConfiguration configuration()
      Gets Hadoop module configuration.
      HadoopCounters counters(HadoopJobId jobId)
      Returns job counters.
      IgniteInternalFuture<?> finishFuture(HadoopJobId jobId)
      Gets Hadoop finish future for particular job.
      boolean kill(HadoopJobId jobId)
      Kills job.
      HadoopJobId nextJobId()
      Generate next job ID.
      HadoopJobStatus status(HadoopJobId jobId)
      Gets Hadoop job execution status.
      IgniteInternalFuture<?> submit(HadoopJobId jobId, HadoopJobInfo jobInfo)
      Submits job to job tracker.

    • Method Detail

        Gets Hadoop module configuration.
        Returns:

      • submit

        IgniteInternalFuture<?> submit(HadoopJobId jobId,
                               HadoopJobInfo jobInfo)
        Submits job to job tracker.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID to submit.
        jobInfo - Job info to submit.
        Returns:
        Execution future.

      • status

        @Nullable
HadoopJobStatus status(HadoopJobId jobId)
                          throws IgniteCheckedException
        Gets Hadoop job execution status.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID to get status for.
        Returns:
        Job execution status or null in case job with the given ID is not found.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • counters

        HadoopCounters counters(HadoopJobId jobId)
                 throws IgniteCheckedException
        Returns job counters.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID to get counters for.
        Returns:
        Job counters object.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • finishFuture

        @Nullable
IgniteInternalFuture<?> finishFuture(HadoopJobId jobId)
                                        throws IgniteCheckedException
        Gets Hadoop finish future for particular job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID.
        Returns:
        Job finish future or null in case job with the given ID is not found.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • kill

        boolean kill(HadoopJobId jobId)
      throws IgniteCheckedException
        Kills job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID.
        Returns:
        True if job was killed.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
